original_text: So we could ask: Why did God give his Law to his people after his promise to Abraham? He gave his Law to show them which things are wrong. It would have authority until Abraham's special descendant would come. That was the descendant that God had promised to bless. God used angels to give his Law to his people. It was Moses who received the Law from God, and Moses then took it to God's people.
korean_text: 그런즉 율법은 무엇이냐 범법하므로 더하여진 것이라 천사들을 통하여 한 중보자의 손으로 베푸신 것인데 약속하신 자손이 오시기까지 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Why did God give his Law to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 하나님은 그의 백성에게 율법을 주셨는가

sentences.original_text: He gave his Law to show them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 보여주기 위해 율법을 주셨습니다
